7731ca1b-c216-4547-9a62-c4e6985cc316.description: Since 2004, WCM has invited senior female-identifying and non-binary high school students with an interest in business, to spend a day in the Canadian financial district. Offered in Vancouver, Calgary, Toronto, and Montreal, Job Shadow Day is a free, day-long event that gives students a unique first-hand view of the exciting and rewarding careers in finance.
7731ca1b-c216-4547-9a62-c4e6985cc316.name: Job Shadow Day

issuer.summary: issued by WCM (Women in Capital Markets)

badge_template_activities.title: Job Shadow Day is a free, day-long event that gives students a unique first-hand view of the exciting and rewarding careers in finance. This interactive day includes workshops, mentoring sessions, and presentations profiling women with diverse careers in finance. The afternoon component grants students access to an industry professional mentor from one of our sponsor firms, who will share advice and insights into their daily professional life, their role and responsibilities.

decbe8c2-1f65-4305-b099-536f5ac85720.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have participated in interactive workshops covering topics such as personal branding, communication, and negotiations. This includes pre-work before sessions and attending live workshops.
decbe8c2-1f65-4305-b099-536f5ac85720.name: WCMAspire

issuer.summary: issued by WCM (Women in Capital Markets)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 7 month program consisting of 10 hours of workshop sessions and self-paced learning. Workshop sessions feature high calibre speakers and professional development experts, presenting on topics that support entry to mid-level professionals by providing tools to achieve your career goals.
Earners must be a WCM member in good standing.
Earners must be a female-identifying professional with up to 5 years of experience in finance and must be currently employed in the finance industry.

447b59e3-3006-4422-a7c8-bf892e5c210b.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have participated in interactive workshops covering topics such as communication, mental resilience, conflict management and resolution, inclusive leadership, and career mobility, progress and performance. This includes pre-work before sessions and attending live workshops.
447b59e3-3006-4422-a7c8-bf892e5c210b.name: WCMElevate

issuer.summary: issued by WCM (Women in Capital Markets)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 7 month program consisting of 10 hours of workshop sessions and self-paced learning. Workshop sessions feature high calibre speakers and professional development experts, presenting on topics that support entry to mid-level professionals as you move your career forward into senior leadership positions and grow your professional network.
Earners must be a WCM member in good standing.
Earners must be a female-identifying professional with 5-10 years of experience in finance and must be currently employed in the finance industry.

2ba8e50d-65d8-41a0-b6f8-c6f1a36d3219.description: Individuals who have earned this badge have participated in interactive workshops covering topics such as conflict management, communication for senior executives, psychological safety in the workplace, allyship in leadership, and defining your decision making style. This includes pre-work before sessions and attending live workshops.
2ba8e50d-65d8-41a0-b6f8-c6f1a36d3219.name: WCMSoar

issuer.summary: issued by WCM (Women in Capital Markets)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 7 month program consisting of 10 hours of workshop sessions and self-paced learning. Workshop sessions feature high calibre speakers and professional development experts, presenting on topics that support senior women in leadership roles move their careers forward and grow their professional network.
Earners must be a WCM member in good standing.
Earners must be a female-identifying professional with 10+ years of experience in finance and must be currently employed in the finance industry.
